ModMetaData.name: Oni of the Rim - Faceless heads
ModMetaData.author: Lucky
ModMetaData.description:
Place this directly after Oni of the Rim race mod in load order.
Requires Alien Framework V2.0 by Erdelf https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=839005762 Original art and concept by Ameiro. Conversion to a race mod, xml, coding, and sprite modifications - MoriShep xml, coding, tidying and debugging - Tarojun New spritework - Lucky
